Articles.Content:
Hi people! Finally i decided to stop lurking the forums and try to be a usefull member of this great comunity!

I have started in the late days of 0.20 and now, in 0.21.1 so far i have deployed a few ecuatorial orbit probes on Kerbin, Mun, Minmus and Duna

I have also scanned Mun for Kethane, but it appears that i forgot how to land properly

In 0.20 i couldnt archieve to dock my space station atempt, even when i was 80 mts away from the other part, i will try again later, but i think im not properly balancing my RCS thrusters

And thanks SQUAD for this great game!
